name: GOTAFE Snap - Course tour
description: Show major navigational features of the snap courses interface

steps.title: GOTAFE Units and Courses
steps.content:
GOTAFE has a brand new look for Units and Courses.

This tour will guide you through the main features.

steps.title: The banner
steps.content: The banner includes the National Unit or Course code(s), that match your enrolment.

steps.title: Contents
steps.content: Use this menu to navigate within your Unit/Course.

steps.title: Progress
steps.content:
Your Progress through each topic is shown here.

When you complete all activities within a topic, a green tick will show here

steps.title: Conditional
steps.content:
A conditional item means that you need to complete a specific activity, before it will open for you. 

An on-screen message will tell you what you need to do.

steps.title: Course Dashboard
steps.content: The Course Dashboard shows your gradebook and fellow participants.

steps.title: My Courses
steps.content: At any time, you can return to "My Courses" which also takes you to your profile, grades and logout.
